title: Bluetooth volume low, absolute volume doesn't fix
content:
I have two bluetooth earbuds that get moderate volume at best. I've followed the steps outline here: https://www.reddit.com/r/GooglePixel/comments/8c1f0z/bluetooth_volume_too_low/

which includes disabling absolute volume in the developer settings, unpairing, and restarting the device. This didn't change anything for me.
